      <section class="widgetSection standard bg-white">
<div class="wrapper">
  <h2>What is PRINCE2?</h2>
<div class="widgetContainer"><div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl04_SingleColumnFlexWidget_wdgtContainer" class="widget width-50">
    <div class="single-column-flex">
        
        <div class='body'><p><strong>PRINCE2</strong> is the world&#39;s most widely-adopted project management method. It is&nbsp;used by people and organizations in a range of different industries.</p>

<p>PRINCE2 is comprised of:</p>

<ul>
	<li>The <a href="/store/book/managing-successful-projects-with-prince2-2017" target="_top" title="Managing Successful Projects with PRINCE2 2017 Edition">PRINCE2 manual </a></li>
	<li>A certification scheme (Foundation and Practitioner levels)</li>
	<li>A supporting membership subscription service.</li>
</ul>

<p>We have&nbsp;also developed <span style="font-size: 16px;"><a href="/best-practice-solutions/prince2/prince2-agile" target="_top" title="PRINCE2 Agile Best Practice Information">PRINCE2 Agile</a></span>, which combines the proven best practice of PRINCE2 with agile concepts, enabling seamless project and product delivery.</p>
</div>
        <a id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl04_SingleColumnFlexWidget_hypLink" title="Find out more about PRINCE2" class="button button-chevron widgetLink" href="/what-is-prince2">Find out more about PRINCE2</a>
    </div>
</div><div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl04_YouTubeWithThumbnail_1_ytbContainer2" class="widget width-50">
          

    <div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl04_YouTubeWithThumbnail_1_ytbContainer" class="youtubeVideo" data-tracking="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=61RnrsWQE7A&amp;feature=youtu.be&amp;wmode=transparent">
        
        <iframe type="text/html" width="0" height="0" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/61RnrsWQE7A?feature=youtu.be&amp;wmode=transparent&amp;fs=0&amp;rel=0&amp;enablejsapi=1&amp;version=3" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

        
    </div>    
</div></div>
</div>
</section>
      <section class="widgetSection standard bg-texture">
<div class="wrapper">
  <h2>The Benefits of PRINCE2</h2>
<div class="widgetContainer"><ul>
	<li><span style="font-size: 17px;">A practical step-by-step guide to successfully manage any project</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size: 17px;">A&nbsp;flexible&nbsp;method that&nbsp;can be tailored to any organization or role involved in managing projects</span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size: 17px;">An accessible and globally-recognized certification which adds value to&nbsp;your CV.</span></li>
</ul>

<p>Learn more about the <a href="/best-practice-solutions/prince2/key-benefits-of-prince2" target="_top" title="Key Benefits of PRINCE2">Key Benefits of PRINCE2</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</section>
      <section class="widgetSection standard bg-white">
<div class="wrapper">
  <h2>PRINCE2 2017</h2>
<div class="widgetContainer">
<div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl06_SingleColumnFlexWidget3_wdgtContainer" class="widget width-50">
    <div class="single-column-flex">
        
        <div class='body'><p>To reflect changes in business practices and following direct community feedback, AXELOS has updated&nbsp;the PRINCE2 guidance and exams.</p>

<p>To find out more about the changes or download a sample of the new guidance, visit our dedicated PRINCE2 2017 Update page.</p>
</div>
        <a id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl06_SingleColumnFlexWidget3_hypLink" title="Learn more about PRINCE2 2017" class="button button-chevron widgetLink" href="/prince2-2017">Learn more about PRINCE2 2017</a>
    </div>
</div><div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl06_SingleColumnFlexWidget4_wdgtContainer" class="widget width-50">
    <div class="single-column-flex">
        
        <div class='body'><img alt="AXELOS Professional Development Programme - Benefits for PRINCE2® practitioners" src="/Corporate/media/Images/Website%20Assets/prince22017_455.png" title="PRINCE2 2017 update information" /></div>
        
    </div>
</div></div>
</div>
</section>
      <section class="widgetSection widgetSection-three-docs standard bg-texture">
<div class="wrapper">
  <h2>How to get Certified in PRINCE2</h2>
<div class="widgetContainer"><div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl07_ListWithChevrons_1_wdgtContainer" class="widget width-50">
<div id="p_lt_ctl04_pageplaceholder_p_lt_ctl07_ListWithChevrons_1_ListPanel" class="link-list">
	
    
    <p>
        The PRINCE2 certifications have been created for anyone who manages projects. This ranges from the dedicated project manager to professionals who manage projects as part of their day-to-day work. They are also relevant to those involved in the design, development and delivery of projects.
    </p>

    <h6>
        These are the certifications available within the scheme:
    </h6>

    <ul>
        <li><a href="/certifications/prince2/prince2-foundation-certification">PRINCE2 Foundation </a></li><li><a href="/certifications/prince2/prince2-practitioner-certification">PRINCE2 Practitioner </a></li><li><a href="/certifications/prince2-certifications/prince2-agile">PRINCE2 Agile</a></li>
